glosses: to get hot, become hot, heat

examples.translation: The stones got hot due to sun(light).

glosses: to get angry, be angry with or towards, lose one's temper

examples.translation: He got very angry when he found out to be deceived.

glosses: not to permit or allow, not to approve, not to look; view; consider or regard well

examples.translation: I can not come since my mother is not allowing me to.

etymology: From Ottoman Turkish قیزمق (qïzmaq, “to become warm, hot or sultry, to get excited”), from Old Anatolian Turkish [script needed] (qïz-, “to be hot, be red”), from Proto-Turkic *kï̄ŕ- (“to be hot, to redden; glow”).
